entry.title: bitcoinj 0.12
entry.summary: Bitcoinj, one of the world's most popular Bitcoin libraries, released version 0.12 on October 3, 2014. Mike Hearn, who made the announcement, expressed his satisfaction and admiration for the capabilities of bitcoinj, citing that just reading the release notes gives one app ideas. The updated library has opened up many possibilities for developers to build applications with this technology.
